backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of frontend file paths with brief descriptions for each component or module.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus OKLCH‑based light/dark theme variables and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing root div and module script loader for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps HomePage with theme provider and notification toaster.
frontend/src/features/compare/components: Currency conversion widget allowing users to convert amounts between selected currencies.
Panel for selecting up to three currencies and viewing comparison and conversion results.
frontend/src/features/compare/lib/conver: Utility for converting amounts between currencies using base-relative rates.
frontend/src/features/rates/api/exchange: API module for fetching latest exchange rates and currency lists from Frankfurter.
frontend/src/features/rates/api/historic: Fetches and formats historical time‑series exchange rates for a currency pair.
frontend/src/features/rates/components/B: Dropdown selector for choosing the base currency with names and loading support.
frontend/src/features/rates/components/D: Renders selectable date‑range preset buttons and notifies when the preset changes.
frontend/src/features/rates/components/H: Generates an SVG line and area chart for historical exchange rates with computed scales and axes.
Displays historical rate chart, range controls, loading/error states, and summary information.
frontend/src/features/rates/components/R: Shows a searchable, sortable table of exchange rates with loading and error handling.
Displays last‑updated info and a refresh button for the rates list.
frontend/src/features/rates/currencyMeta: Provides a map of currency codes to human‑readable names and a lookup helper.
frontend/src/features/rates/hooks/useHis: React Query hook that fetches historical exchange rates based on a selected date‑range preset.
frontend/src/features/rates/hooks/useLiv: React Query hook that retrieves live exchange rates with periodic auto‑refresh.
frontend/src/features/rates/lib/dateRang: Defines date‑range presets and utilities to compute ISO date ranges and labels.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication with AuthClient, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module for backend-specific React Query hooks; currently exports nothing.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, theme variables, and dark mode color tokens for the app’s visual design.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the main dashboard page displaying live currency rates, controls, historical charts, and social links.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending themes, colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature requirements, and current state for tracking development progress.
